member.name: M:Dunyana.API.Controllers.CustomerController.GetProfileDetails(Dunyana.Dto.GetProfileDto)
member.summary: Returns the details of the logged in user ( Customer or Merchant or Naqel user).
member.returns: A task that upon completion contains the user details.

member.name: M:Dunyana.API.Controllers.OrdersController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the details of the logged in user orders ( Customer).
member.returns: A task that upon completion contains the customer orders.
